content.question: The graph provided shows the imposition of a per-unit tax on producers. Which areas represent government tax revenue, producer surplus, and deadweight loss after the imposition of the tax?

choices.label: The government tax revenue is <math alttext="P sub 5, P sub 3, M J" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>MJ</mi></math>; The producer surplus is <math alttext="P sub 3, P sub 1, L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math>; The deadweight loss is <math alttext="J N L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>JNL</mi></math>.

The government tax revenue is <math alttext="P sub 5, P sub 2, N J" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>NJ</mi></math>; The producer surplus is <math alttext="P sub 6 P sub 5 J" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>6</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>; The deadweight loss is <math alttext="P sub 4, P sub 5, J" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>.

The government tax revenue is <math alttext="J N L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>JNL</mi></math>; The producer surplus is <math alttext="P sub 3, P sub 1, N M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>NM</mi></math>; The deadweight loss is <math alttext="M L N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>MLN</mi></math>.

The government tax revenue is <math alttext="P sub 5, P sub 2, N J" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>NJ</mi></math>; The producer surplus is <math alttext="P sub 2, P sub 1, N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>; The deadweight loss is <math alttext="J N L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>JNL</mi></math>.

The government tax revenue is <math alttext="P sub 5, P sub 3, M J" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>MJ</mi></math>; The producer surplus is <math alttext="P sub 3, P sub 1, L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math>; The deadweight loss is <math alttext="J M L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>JML</mi></math>.

content.answer: The government tax revenue is <math alttext="P sub 5, P sub 2, N J" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>NJ</mi></math>; The producer surplus is <math alttext="P sub 2, P sub 1, N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>; The deadweight loss is <math alttext="J N L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>JNL</mi></math>.

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
